citations.narrative:
Enclosures numbered 22, 24, 25 and 35 had rusty and sharp metal edges on the self-feeders on the sides of the trough.
Sharp metal edges could injure the guinea pigs while eating and rusty surfaces can not be properly clean and sanitized.
Primary enclosures for guinea pigs including accessories must be constructed and maintained in good repair to protect
the animals and maintained so that surfaces are impervious to liquids and moisture. The rusty and sharp edges on self-
feeders need to be repaired or replaced. Correct by June 20, 2023.
This inspection and exit interview were conducted with the licensee.
n

narrative:
3.28(a)(1) 
   
Primary enclosures. 
Enclosures numbered 22, 24, 25 and 35 had rusty and sharp metal edges on the self-feeders on the sides of the trough. 
Sharp metal edges could injure the guinea pigs while eating and rusty surfaces can not be properly clean and sanitized. 
Primary enclosures for guinea pigs including accessories must be constructed and maintained in good repair to protect 
the animals and maintained so that surfaces are impervious to liquids and moisture. The rusty and sharp edges on self-
feeders need to be repaired or replaced. Correct by June 20, 2023. 
 
This inspection and exit interview were conducted with the licensee. 
 
 n
